message: This is a high-quality product, worth $3000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is 33.33% of its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you because I think you're a reputable buyer.

I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not convinced by it. If I buy the product and it's low-quality, I won't be able to sell it or use it, so the refund won't change the fact that I've wasted my money. I'll pass on this offer.

Since we've had two consecutive low-quality products, the probability that the next product is also low-quality is still 66.67%, but the probability that the next product is high-quality is now 33.33%.
